concept.title: Configuring the Integrated Management Module II interface
concept.shortdesc: You can configure the Integrated Management Module II (IMM2) LAN interface IP address by using the device immlan set command on the command line.

conbody.p: The IMM2 service processor provides remote management and control of the appliance, independent of the status of the appliance. System administrators can use the IMM2 LAN interface to monitor hardware component status and power consumption on the appliance.
The IMM2 interface is located on the back of the appliance.
For more information about configuring the IMM2 interface by using the command line, see .
For information about IMM2, see the IBM Integrated Management Module II User's Guide.
